td.content: s:pt complains of moderate heart burn, severe regurgitation, moderate retrosternal chest pain and Stomach and other medical problems. NKDA. patient is a white F unemployed aged 29 yrs. she denies smoking she drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 68 in, Weight 96 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16, Chest = Scattered crackles with occasional wheeze B/L a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Omeprazole - 20 mg po bid x 4 week, and ordered Ambulatory PH monitoring (24 Hrs).

s:pt complains of severe vomiting, difficulty swallowing and hoarseness and other medical problems. NKDA. she is a 30 YO F. o:Height 68 in, Weight 96 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Mouth = posterior oropharyngeal erythema, diffuse dental erosions a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.
